review.employee-type: Research Assistant for Infrared Photodetectors Optimization (Former Employee)
review.title: “A great internship within this private R&D organization”
review.pros: Pros – Great ressources, a friendly and helpful staff, relatively good location (I was in the Palaiseau office)
review.cons: Cons – Having been founded by Alcatel and Thales, there are some organizational and funding issues that regularly arise...
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Establish one common policy that is sufficiently flexible so as to account for noticeable progresses in the science.
